name: Air Rallye
overview: Created by SoftEdge Software and released by HesWare in 1984 this flying air rally game allows creations and saving of own maps or use of computer generated rally point maps. In the simplest of these courses, start at one end, hit the midpoint and make your way to and around the endpoint and back as quickly as possible. Watch your gauges, the RPM, altitude and heading. Instruction mode helps you know then you need to fix these settings and use of the map will show you where you are in relation to the checkpoints and turn points. Any game you walk away from is a good game!
developers: Philip K.Thomas, Martin E. Flatebo & Kristin Bryan
